recipesJson.name: Foolish times
recipesJson.author: Deweysuds
recipesJson.description: A simple in your face with flavor, bright, tart, and juicy green apple pear mix.  Anton apple is the star of the show in this one.  The INW pear add a bright juicy pear that teams great with the Anton.  Fuji and FA pear back everything up to round it out, sweeten, juice it up, and to give it a fuller flavor.  - Shake and vape certified
